event.title: The REUSE project in Merano, Italy

body.p: The Free Software community will meet at 20:00 at the Mexican Restaurant Da Carlos Harmonie, via Matteotti 11, 39012 Merano BZ, Italy, for dinner and to have a discussion round about the REUSE project.
No registration needed, if you can announce your attendance writing an e-mail to patrick@fsfe.org we will reserve a big enough table.
